p: Further, structural and evolutionary analyses indicate that SARS-CoV-2 Mpro is a highly conserved viral protein, which recognizes the sequence Leu-Met-Phe-Glnâ†“Ser-Gly-Ala while no human proteases share the same specificity [24].
